description:
Misty mornings, lonely forest roads, mountain passes... it's funny how some of the most beautiful cycling settings also happen to be the chilliest. Sitting right in between a softshell and a long sleeve jersey, the Provincial Thermal is warm, soft, and has excellent wicking performance, letting you absorb the moment in comfort. Its close-to-the-body fit is ideal for touring, randonneuring and relaxed cool-weather club rides. And spacious drop-in pockets, let you carry all you need for those all-day epics.

  • Recycled polyester fleece is warm and wicking, with a soft, brushed finish
  • Full length zip lets you vent extra heat
  • Comfortable chinguard, keeps the zipper off your chin while tucking into the drop bars
  • 3 drop-in back pockets have enough room for snacks, an extra bottle, light jacket and the always nearby banana
  • Reflective details on sleeves and back help keep you seen
  • Dropped hem ensures good lower back coverage when in riding position
  • Bottom hem has a wide, soft silicone band to prevent riding up
  • Fit is close to the body but not skin-tight for riding comfort
name: MEC Provincial Thermal Long Sleeve - Men's
